title: Parkland shareholders vote for $9.1 billion acquisition by Sunoco
content: Parkland Corp shareholders on Tuesday voted in favor of a $9.1 billion deal to be acquired by U.S.-based Sunoco .

sources.title: Parkland shareholders vote for $9.1 billion acquisition by Sunoco

title: Fed's Barr: inflation to rise, may see some persistence
content: Higher import levies will put upward pressure on prices that may not prove temporary, Federal Reserve Governor Michael Barr said on Tuesday in remarks that suggest he is in no rush to cut interest rates despite what he called "gradual, albeit uneven" progress toward 2% inflation to date.

sources.title: Fed's Barr: inflation to rise, may see some persistence

title: Investment groups call for exemption of passive income from US tax bill
content: Six investment groups representing sectors including fund managers, venture capital and real estate in a letter to two Senate Republicans over the tax and spending bill now under debate asked that passive investments be exempt from a provision of the bill that targets foreign investors.

sources.title: Investment groups call for exemption of passive income from US tax bill

title: Gold Reserve requests clarification about US license protecting Citgo
content: Gold Reserve has filed an emergency request with a court in Delaware asking for clarification about a license by the U.S. Treasury Department that last week extended its protection over Venezuela-owned U.S. refiner Citgo Petroleum even amid a court-organized auction to pay creditors, the company said on Tuesday.

sources.title: Gold Reserve requests clarification about US license protecting Citgo

title: Spirit Airlines urges US to reject JetBlue, United partnership
content: Budget airline Spirit Airlines on Tuesday urged the Transportation Department to reject a proposed JetBlue Airways and United Airlines partnership, saying it was anticompetitive and will prompt large carriers to pursue similar deals.

sources.title: Spirit Airlines urges US to reject JetBlue, United partnership

title: Prudential Financial's PGIM to merge units into $1 trillion credit platform
content: PGIM, the investment management arm of insurer Prudential Financial , will combine its fixed income and private credit units to create a nearly $1 trillion credit platform, a company spokesperson said on Tuesday.

sources.title: Prudential Financial's PGIM to merge units into $1 trillion credit platform

title: Exclusive: Uber-backed electric bike startup Lime hires banks for US IPO, sources say
content: Lime, a startup backed by Uber Technologies that operates an electric bike and scooter network, has hired investment banks to help it prepare for a long-awaited U.S. initial public offering, according to people familiar with the matter.

sources.title: Exclusive: Uber-backed electric bike startup Lime hires banks for US IPO, sources say

title: Shares of US, European airlines rise on hopes of Israel-Iran truce
content: Shares of U.S. and European airlines rose on Tuesday, while oil prices declined on expectations that a ceasefire between Israel and Iran would hold.

sources.title: Shares of US, European airlines rise on hopes of Israel-Iran truce

title: Fed's Hammack sees no imminent need to cut interest rates
content: Federal Reserve Bank of Cleveland President Beth Hammack said Tuesday she sees no pressing need to cut interest rates when there’s still a lot of uncertainty what trade tariffs will do to inflation, which is still above the central bank’suncertainty what“Given the resilience of the economy thus far, the risks from maintaining the current policy setting appear low, and I don’t see a weakening in the economy that would merit imminent rate cuts, though I remain attentive to that possibility,” Hammack said in the text of a speech to be delivered in London.

sources.title: Fed's Hammack sees no imminent need to cut interest rates

title: US strikes did not destroy Iran nuclear programme, says intelligence assessment
content: The White House called the initial damage evaluation on Iran's uranium stockpile "flat-out wrong".

sources.title: US strikes did not destroy Iran nuclear programme, says intelligence assessment

title: How a volatile 24 hours edged Iran and Israel to a ceasefire
content: From an attack on a US air base to a fragile ceasefire, this is how the Middle East conflict changed overnight.

sources.title: How a volatile 24 hours edged Iran and Israel to a ceasefire

title: Leaders arrive at Hague summit as Nato chief Rutte flatters Trump
content: It is the US president's first Nato summit since 2019 and all 32 leaders are set to commit to a big hike in defence spending.

sources.title: Leaders arrive at Hague summit as Nato chief Rutte flatters Trump
